properties.entry: MATCH (:User {foursquareId:{1}})-[:LIKES]->(c:Category) RETURN ID(c), c.spanishName, c.iconUrl, c.foursquareId
MATCH (c:Category)<-[:IS]-(:Poi {foursquareId:{1}}) RETURN ID(c), c.spanishName, c.iconUrl, c.foursquareId
MATCH (c:Category) WHERE c.spanishName =~ '(?i).*%s.*' RETURN ID(c), c.spanishName, c.iconUrl, c.foursquareId LIMIT 5
